sentences.en: a very pleasing outlook from the bedroom window
sentences.cn: 从卧室窗户看出去的宜人景色

sentences.en: Exercise will improve your looks and your outlook.
sentences.cn: 运动将会改善你的外在形象和人生态度。

sentences.en: Has motherhood changed your career outlook?
sentences.cn: 当了母亲是否改变了你的职业前途？

sentences.en: He had a practical outlook on life.
He remained for some years avowedly radical in his political outlook.
sentences.cn: 他多年来保持公然激进的政治观。

sentences.en: His basic outlook remains anchored in the liberal tradition.
sentences.cn: 他的基本观念依旧扎根于自由主义传统。

sentences.en: I adopted a positive outlook on life.
sentences.cn: 我开始抱持积极向上的人生观。

sentences.en: In the medium term the UK car industry has a brighter outlook.
sentences.cn: 从中期来看，英国汽车行业前景将会更好。

sentences.en: Priestley's rational outlook in science carried over to religion.
sentences.cn: 普里斯特利在科学上的理性世界观延伸到了宗教思想上。

sentences.en: She is very modern in outlook.
The changed outlook entails higher economic growth than was previously assumed.
sentences.cn: 观念的改变势必会使得经济增长高于之前预计的水平。

sentences.en: The illness had a profound effect on his outlook.
sentences.cn: 这场病对他的人生观产生了深刻的影响。

sentences.en: The outlook for sufferers from this disease is bleak.
sentences.cn: 这种疾病的患者痊愈的希望渺茫。

sentences.en: The outlook for the weekend is hot and sunny.
sentences.cn: 预计本周末将为晴热天气。

sentences.en: The outlook now is starkly different.
sentences.cn: 现在的看法已经完全不同了。

sentences.en: The short-term outlook for employment remains gloomy.
sentences.cn: 近期的就业前景依然暗淡。

sentences.en: This outlook helped her to navigate through her later years with success.
sentences.cn: 这种观念帮她安度了晚年。

sentences.en: We were quite different in outlook, Philip and I.
sentences.cn: 我和菲利普的世界观截然不同。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 精神境界，精神面貌
个人邮件及资讯管理软件

trans.tran_cn: 前景，展望，观点，见解，景色，眺望处
trans.tran_en: your general attitude to life and the world
